headline.main: Five Pioneers In Medicine Get Lasker Awards

docs.abstract: Drs Sune D Bergstrom, Bengt Samuelsson and John R Vane to share $15,000 Albert Lasker Basic Med Research Award for pioneering research concerning prostaglandins, natural body regulators (M)
